definition: to take advantage/to seize an opportunity/in passing/without taking extra trouble/conveniently
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Water flows and so must you.
sentences.chinese: 水顺势而行，你也应该如此。

sentences.english: Freelancing is often about choosing your battles and going with the flow.
sentences.chinese: 自由职业往往是选择你的战场，并且顺势而行。

sentences.english: Thee small stone elephant was also carved on a natural stone.
sentences.chinese: 小石象也是利用一块天然的石头顺势雕凿而成。
顺势疗法是一个饱受争议的领域。

sentences.english: It is interesting to note, that the Royal Family in England only use homeopathy.
sentences.chinese: 应该注意到有趣的是，英国皇家一直在采用顺势疗法。

sentences.english: Just like fire, burnin' up the way.
sentences.chinese: 就如同星星之火，顺势燎原。

sentences.english: Take advantage of an opportunity and be and strategic lead is faddish and consistent style actually.
sentences.chinese: 顺势而为和战略超前实际上是风行一贯的作风。

sentences.english: Do you think there's something to homeopathy as well?
sentences.chinese: 你认为你的工作也有些顺势疗法的意思？

sentences.english: Some firms are responding by launching e-readers based on LCD technology.
sentences.chinese: 一些公司顺势发布了基于LCD技术的电子阅读器。

sentences.english: As with all homeopathic formulas, alcohol and purified water are used.
sentences.chinese: 在所有顺势疗法的药物中，都使用到了纯净水和酒精。

sentences.english: there was no convincing evidence that homeopathy was superior to placebo.
sentences.chinese: 没有令人信服的证据表明顺势疗法优于安慰剂。

sentences.english: And, as a homeopathic medicine, there are no reported side effects.
sentences.chinese: 而且，作为一种顺势疗法药物，没有任何副作用。

sentences.english: Homeopathic treatment is based on the "like cures like" principle .
sentences.chinese: 顺势疗法是基于“以毒攻毒”的原理。

sentences.english: With willingness, buy at limit up and sell at limit down.
sentences.chinese: 只要顺势，心甘情愿在涨停板买入，在跌停板卖出。

sentences.english: Upper night will hear a plank of wood borers in defoliation , and the sawdust on homeopathy.
sentences.chinese: 晚上会听见上铺有蛀虫在啃食木板，木屑就顺势而下。

sentences.english: Homeopathics believe that the ingredients work to resolve those symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 顺势疗法者认为这些原料都能消除症状。

definition: to turn a hand over/to put one's hand behind one's back/fig. easily done
to borrow sb's authority/to seize an opportunity
direct (opposite: indirect 間接|间接[jian4 jie1])/immediate/straightforward
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
to follow up a victory and press home the attack/to pursue retreating enemy
to do sth by force/Taiwan pr. [qiang3 xing2]
to catch up with/to keep pace with
